507.    Spy Camera OS (SCOS)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=JWork+(Jimmy+Halim)" title="JWork (Jimmy Halim)">JWork (Jimmy Halim)</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.jwork.spycamera.free"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIgogEh4KGGNvbS5qd29yay5zcHljYW1lcmEuZnJlZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Everyone at one time will want to capture image without anyone notice it, this application will give you an easy, fast and smart way doing it.<br>Spy Camera OS is the best application in the market to do that.<p>★★★ <br>Support the development by purchasing the donate version at<br>https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jwork.spycamera.donate <br>★★★ </p><p>Spy Camera OS have been downloaded by more than 1 millions users. </p><p>---NOTICE---<br>This is re-submit app of SCOS, syncing with Google keyword policy. Please keep supporting SCOS development</p><p>---FAQ---<br>Q: I'm using Xiaomi phone or MIUI ROM, the UI is not displayed. I only can see the camera image preview. Can you make it work on MIUI ROM?<br>A: It's already work fine on MIUI ROM, but MIUI by default disabling floating windows which used by SCOS. So you need to go to android setting - apps - SC-OS then enable floating windows.</p><p>Q: Why I cannot use external SDCard setting<br>A: Starting Android 4.4 Kitkat, Google prevent non-system application to write on external sdcard. This can be resolve with root access.</p><p>---Review---<br>- http://blog.apptopia.com/spy-camera-os-james-bond-level-spy-tools/<br>- http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0u2gsD-oMZE (video review based on v0.3.5)<br>- http://gs3.wonderhowto.com/how-to/take-spy-photos-videos-with-your-galaxy-s3-other-android-phone-0155916/ <br>- http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8bJcv2mv_PA (video review based on v0.1.5)<br>- http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kwYCSWgjdRQ (video review based on v0.1.1)<br>- http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ZhlnoufX1A (video review based on v0.1.1)<br>- http://www.xda-developers.com/android/open-source-spy-camera-app-helps-take-secret-pictures/<br>- http://techtrickz.com/mobile/spy-camera-os-for-android-lets-you-capture-photos-without-giving-hint-of-snapping/</p><p>---Questions---<br>If you are having trouble with this version please sent email (setting - send feedback) or to jwork.production@gmail.com. I won't able to help you if you only wrote that on comment.<br>You can try to uninstall and reinstall the app when capturing not working properly.</p><p>---Features---<br>- Small size application<br>- Video Recording (Experimental)<br>- Widget for faster capture &amp; more secure shortcut naming<br>- Auto email images</p><p>---Language<br>- English<br>- Spanish (antieco)<br>- German (Christoph </div>  <div class="description">  想要得到像單反相機的背景模糊效果？還是想強調的照片特別的東西？<br>背景虛化效果的照片模糊的照片，讓你模糊了照片中的任何選擇部分上的另一個想要照片的一部分設定對焦和流行的照片或流行音樂的人的任何部分的照片畫集中到照片的模糊部分。<p>背景虛化照片效果很容易使用：<br>1.選擇照片從畫廊，谷歌驅動器，Dropbox的或直接從相機拍攝一張照片。<br>2.原始照片顯示，你可以想模糊區域，使用可用的工具來微調模糊的照片，並專注於照片的通緝的一部分。</p><p>可用工具如下：<br>*增加/減少畫筆大小<br>*增加/減少模糊強度<br>*撤消</p><p>有知道在哪裡模糊的照片可以讓你的超級攝影師很好的理解。</p><p></p><p></p> Fotos Art - Photo Studio  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=APPFREE" title="APPFREE">APPFREE</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.azstudio.fotos"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHAoaEhgKEmNvbS5henN0dWRpby5mb3RvcxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Fotos Art is a software that comes packed with some elements that you need to create greeting cards, collages, and others.<p>Now, you can edit the photograph by adjusting its brightness (contrast and saturation), tint (hue and lightness), balance (cyan, magenta, yellow), as well as rotate or crop it.</p><p>In addition, you can apply various filters which consist of 'Sepia' (scratch effect, dark borders, stamp effect), 'Colorize' (hue, lightness, saturation), 'Wave' (amplitude, width, phase), 'Watercolor' (brush size, sharpness, saturation) and 'Color Reduction' (color count, use single tint, choose color).</p><p>All in all, Fotos Art is a fun tool for first-time users to play with. However, if you're looking for more serious results, then you should try a more professional software.</p><p>Fotos Art Guide<br>1. Open and select "Camera"<br>2. Choose your style of collage<br>3. Drag each photo into your picture collage editing space<br>4. Adjust the border color and size and round the corners of the photo if you want<br>5. Save and share (facebook, twitter, google+, instagram, email, sms, ...)</p><p>Download free  Fotos Art(Photo Grid) and discover your inner artist!</p><p>★ Copyright 2014 AZSTUDIO, 現已支援Android手機和平板◆◇◆</p><p><br>滿足相片行動編輯一切需求:<br>簡易上手但功能強大的相片編輯工具<br>✩  快速校正白平衡，提高色彩準確度<br>✩  輕鬆調整色調、過度曝光或曝光不足以及對比<br>✩  調整色彩飽和度，賦予相片生動色彩</p><p><br>智慧物件移除<br>✩  輕鬆簡易移除相片中多餘物件或人物</p><p><br>輕鬆添加HDR、風格檔及覆蓋圖層<br>✩ 添加及調整HDR特效，打造戲劇張力十足的風景照<br>✩ 收錄豐富相片風格檔，包含Lomo、藝術、HDR效果和暈影等超過40種樣式，快速套用賦予相片全新樣貌，為作品畫龍點睛。<br>✩ 一鍵套用覆蓋圖層，打造漏光效果</p><p><br>打造完美肖像<br>✩  利用修容工具改善膚質，彈指之間打造完美肖像</p><p><br>豐富相框及場景設計讓作品更出色<br>✩  只需手指輕輕一點，即可套用內建15種創意相框任一種，讓作品更出色。<br>✩  隨心所欲套用任一設計感十足、趣味場景，為相片增添獨特風格！</p><p><br>隨觸編輯 隨時分享<br>✩  可在App中直接啟動相機拍照，或從照片庫上開啟現有相片進行編輯。<br>✩  可直接從App中將你的創作作品設定為行動裝置桌布<br>✩  編輯後可立即上傳編修後的作品至Facebook和Flickr等社群網站，與家人及朋友分享您的得意之作，輕鬆不費力！</p><p><br>◆◇◆    最低系統需求  ◆◇◆<br>✩   Android 4.1以上<br>✩  1GHz 處理器<br>✩  768MB 記憶體<br>✩  480x640 解析度<br>✩  ARM中央處理器、Tegra 3以上</p><p>◆◇◆    僅支援JPEG / PNG 圖片格式  ◆◇◆</p><p><br>訊連科技十分尊重您的寶貴建議及回饋！若您有任何疑問和想法，請來信至PhotoDirector_AppSupport@cyberlink.com 最簡單、最快速的照片視頻編輯器（照片幻燈片）！<p>Photo Story只需三步，便可將您的相片制作成精美視頻/幻燈片<br>1. 挑選照片 － 從手機相冊中選擇照片<br>2. 創建視頻 － 設置照片風格、背景音樂，即使默認設置也已足夠精美<br>3. 保存分享 － 保存視頻到手機本地，還可分享至Instagram/Youtube等眾多社交平臺</p><p>功能關鍵點：<br>- 字幕。可以為每張照片添加字幕<br>- 視頻動畫。多種漂亮的轉場動畫，譬如平移縮放、滑進滑出、漸隱漸出等等<br>- 照片濾鏡。目前支持7種濾鏡效果，更多效果正在開發中<br>- 自定義背景音樂。內置5首背景音樂， 也可以從自己的音樂庫中選擇。可以自定義音樂起始點<br>- 最多20張相片。可以隨時更改和重新排序<br>- 高清輸出。可以將視頻保存為1080P，當然也可以選擇360P、480P、720P等等<br>- 更多可選設置項。影片播放速度、照片裁剪等等，都可以自定義。</p><p>總之，Photo Story是壹款簡單高效的照片幻燈片編輯工具，只需簡單三步邊可制作相片視頻（相冊MV、照片幻燈片、幻燈片視頻）。<br>更多功能，如字幕效果、更多視頻特效正在開發中，敬請期待後續更新。</p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target"
